original_text: Pharaoh's cup was in my hand. I took the grapes and I squeezed them. Then I put the juice into the cup and I gave the cup to Pharaoh.’
korean_text: 내 손에 바로의 잔이 있기로 내가 포도를 따서 그 즙을 바로의 잔에 짜서 그 잔을 바로의 손에 드렸노라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh's cup was in my hand
Then I put the juice into the cup
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 나는 즙을 잔에 부었습니다

sentences.original_text: and I gave the cup to Pharaoh
